Websites.name: Portfolio Website Template
Websites.description: A clean and minimalistic portfolio website template designed for creative professionals like artists, designers, or developers. It features a prominent header, easy navigation, and sections for an 'About Me' introduction and a project gallery. Each project is displayed in a card format, allowing visitors to appreciate the work at a glance.
Websites.author: John Doe

Websites.name: Blog Website Template
Websites.description: A simple and elegant blog template perfect for writers and bloggers who want to share their thoughts on various topics. It includes an 'About Me' section and a blog post feed where articles are presented in card format for quick browsing.
Websites.author: Jane Smith

Websites.name: Business Website Template
Websites.description: A professional business website template ideal for companies seeking to present their services and engage clients. It features a clean layout with sections for business services, contact information, and a professional feel throughout.
Websites.author: Alex Johnson

Websites.name: Landing Page Template
Websites.description: A landing page template designed to promote a specific product or service. It includes clear calls to action (CTAs) with a focus on generating leads or driving conversions. The layout is simple yet effective, highlighting key features and benefits of the product.
Websites.author: Emily Carter

Websites.name: E-commerce Website Template
Websites.description: An e-commerce website template designed for online stores. It features a product showcase, clean navigation, and a layout optimized for displaying multiple products. Perfect for retail businesses looking to provide a seamless shopping experience to their customers.
Websites.author: Michael Lee
